locations.address: 216 West Hampton Avenue, Capitol Heights, MD 20743
locations.description:
To make your appointments Text name, time of arrival and warehouse # where you want your appointment @(240) 461-5248

* By regular message, WhatsApp and Signal only

**No calls**

It is very difficult for us to answer calls and so many messages at once, thank you for your patience, we will confirm as soon as possible

**NOTE:** PRODUCTS MAY VARY DURING THE DAY

locations.name: Gaithersburg
locations.description:
Call in advance for services
Our truck will set up in the upper parking lot by the cafeteria on the side of the building.
Manna works in cooperation with certain qualifying community residences to provide food distribution.  Contact your resident manager to learn how to schedule a pick up.

locations.name: Greenspring
locations.org: Plantation Park Heights Urban Farm Fridge
locations.description:
Fridge is located in the farm
This fridge is stocked solely BY the farm. Neighbors are invited to take what they need, but unlike other BCFN sites, they do NOT accept outside donations. So, please don't leave anything on-site!
